name: My Muppets Show
description:
Do You Miss My Muppets Show..?

Did You LOVE My Muppets Show..?

WELL This Game Is PERFECT FOR YOU!!!

Enjoy With the Muppets All Together Singing Happily! They Are Happy To See You Back! Wohoo! The Game Only Haves The Muppet Theater And It Might Have Some Differences Because Well, It Was Made In Scratch! But STILL The Game Is VERY GOOD And You Might Enjoy It A Lot!! Enjoy This Nostalgic Game!!

Also Sometimes You Have To Click The Muppets A Bit More For Them To Combine!
